text: Emva koko, iintliziyo zenu zaba lukhuni zanga zingamatye okanye ngaphezulu nasematyeni. Kuba eneneni akhona amatye ekumpompoza imithombo kuwo.Kanti akhona namanye kuwo aye ahlukane kubini khon’ukuze kumpompoze amanzi kuwo, kanti ngenene akhona namanye aye awe phantsi ngenxa yokoyika uAllâh. Yaye sanukucinga ukuba uAllâh Akakwazi oko nikwenzayo
